card.title: A world of education is coming to the Qatar
card.body: This global event series is brought to you by London-based BMI/Times Higher Education, owners of the prestigious World University Rankings.

card.title: Meet over 105 different institutions
card.body: Universities, Business and High Schools from the UAE and 20 other countries. Senior admissions staff are ready to help.

card.title: Live interactive seminars
card.body: Attend live information sessions to learn about visas, fees, the application process, accommodation and overseas work opportunities.

card.title: Build the employable YOU!
card.body: Make the right course choice. Learn how your studies can turbocharge your career and make you employable anywhere in the world.

card.title: All your questions answered
card.body: The right course and country is a big decision. Receive 1-1 counselling from international experts. Make the right choice.

card.title: Discover 1000's of courses
card.body: Undergraduate, Postgraduate, MBA, High School. The perfect course is waiting for you.
